name: karp-inspector-lite
description: Semantic codebase search for Claude Desktop. Find code by meaning, not just keywords. Zero API keys, zero setup.

project_path.title: Project Folder
project_path.description: Select the codebase folder to index and search

tools.name: search_code
tools.description: Semantic search by meaning. Use for concepts like 'authentication logic' or 'payment handling'. For exact strings, use grep_code. Requires index_project first.

tools.name: grep_code
tools.description: Exact string or regex search. Use for variable names, imports, error messages. For concepts, use search_code.

tools.name: file_outline
tools.description: Structural outline of any file — classes, methods, functions with signatures and line numbers — without loading content.

tools.name: index_project
tools.description: Index or re-index the project. Run before first search_code use. Loads from disk cache in under a second on subsequent runs.

tools.name: reindex_file
tools.description: Re-index a single file after editing to keep search results current. Saves a snapshot.

tools.name: file_history
tools.description: List saved snapshots of a file.

tools.name: file_diff
tools.description: Diff between two snapshots of a file.

tools.name: project_stats
tools.description: Index statistics. Use to verify the project is indexed and check coverage before searching.

tools.name: set_project
tools.description: Switch to a different project directory. Loads cached index if available, otherwise run index_project.
